**Next we will perform the data cleaning steps as below.**

-   Replacing all `NA` values with 0.



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
t20[t20 == ""] <- NA
t20[is.na(t20)] <- 0
```
:::



-   Removing `season`, `other_wicket_type` and `other_player_dismissed` column as they are not required in our analysis.

-   Creating a new variable `over` i.e. the over number at which the particular ball was bowled and `over_type` i.e. the phase of play (Powerplay, Middle Over, Death Over).

-   Next, creating bunch of binary variables `isOne`, `isTwo`, `isThree`, `isFour`, `isSix` from `runs_off_bat` and `isOut` from `wicket_type`. Also, creating another variable `team_runs` after combining `runs_off_bat` and `extras`.
